subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
Bank Robberies
lead_paragraph: Luther Burden starred for the University of Utah and played for the Knicks in the 1970s. He was convicted of robbing a Long Island bank in 1980.
snippet: Luther Burden starred for the University of Utah and played for the Knicks in the 1970s. He was convicted of robbing a Long Island bank in 1980.
